meanings.definition: Rekeyboards: to type on a keyboard again
meanings.sent1: After making a mistake, she had to rekeyboards the entire paragraph.
meanings.sent2: I often rekeyboards my emails to make sure they are error-free.
meanings.sent3: He had to rekeyboards his password multiple times before finally getting it right.
meanings.sent4: The writer had to rekeyboards his thoughts to convey them clearly.
meanings.sent5: She decided to rekeyboards the document to correct the formatting issues.

meanings.definition: Rekeyboards: keyboards that have been typed on again
meanings.sent1: The rekeyboards in the computer lab were worn out from constant use.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using new keyboards rather than rekeyboards.
meanings.sent3: The office manager ordered new keyboards to replace the old rekeyboards.
meanings.sent4: The rekeyboards in the library were missing some keys.
meanings.sent5: He found it challenging to type on the rekeyboards due to their worn-out keys.
